attributes.review: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆/Can we 🧐pretend that 😛airplanes 🛩in the night sky 🌌 are like shootin' stars🌟 I could really 🤓use a wish 🙏right now, 🤕wish right now, 😿wish right now/aLL🥶oF😳tHiS😑dRaMa😤gOiNg🤮oN🤭iS😓bEcAuSe🤬i😐KiSseD💋nEsSa🤢WhEn🙄wE😬WeRe🤥bOtG😠SiNgLe🤡/foreigner💕foreigner💕foreigner/have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄/⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⟟⏁⋉⟒👽⟒⋔⍜⊑👽⍀⏃⏁⏃⌿⏃⍀⏃⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⎍⋔⎍👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍀⏃⏁⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⌰⏃⏁⟒⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⋔⍜⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍜⌰⋔⟒⋏⏃👽⎅⟒⌿⏃⎅⏃⍀⟟👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽 ⎅⟟⋔⟒⎅⏃⟒👽/why❓don't⌛we🔪just👽R͜͡E͜͡L͜͡A͜͡X͜͡X͜͡X͜͡X͜͡😩and🤬turn🦷on🦾the💅r̥ͦḁͦd̥ͦi̥ͦo̥ͦ📻 would👿you😼like💕卂爪爪爪爪👹or🤪 ቻጠጠጠጠ👺/ል̂ዪቿ̂ ሃ̈ዐ̀ሁ̄ ር̧ዐ̃ጠጎ̈ክ́ኗ ፕዐ̈ ዕል̊ ፕዪቿ̂🌳🌲/she👩🏽 like🌂papî 🍰I 🍾adore 💘you🤸‍♀️i’m 🛍like 🩸baby 🎀 i 🖍ain't 💅normal👩‍🦯 Rrrrr 🦁 🦁🦁 foreigner 💕foreigner 💕/Lilhuddy😳æ💖hœ🤪hö✨udi🌲upa🐸pö😺pœ👄udï👏upæ🎂pupa😢bō🤠tsee🥵tsa😆wæ✨

So I download the app, right? Well all of a sudden my phone gets all of these notifications even though I don’t have my notifications turned on. Then I looked at the notification and it said “Donald trump🍊 is typing...” and I was like no way. And then I opened it up and he said “how old are you” 
And I was like “15”
And he was like “pic” when I ignored it my phone kept blowing up with notifications and next thing I know I try to delete the app but I couldn’t
My phone screen went black and when it finally turned back on the was a picture of Donald as my HOME SCREEN
Next thing I knew there was another “Donald trump 🍊is typing...” notification and he said 
Whatever I’ll just date my daughters friends then 
Finally I was able to delete the app but not without ptsd of ever seeing Trump ever again. 
After this traumatic experience I decided I was hungry but all we had were oranges. I couldn’t do it. I will never be able to eat an orange again 😖
So trump is the reason for my ptsd and the reason I will become fat because oranges were the only fruit I could ever eat 
Thank you for your time :)
attributes.title: Hacked (just read it ✨)

attributes.title: Important

attributes.review: Gen z don’t go down with out a fight

So I downloaded this app to support trump and America, but when it finally finished downloading all the sudden I started to get a virus on my phone and I asked for help to get the virus off of my phone. All the sudden the virus got WORSE! I was not happy about that. Then I started getting unknown callers and I was sacred because they were so many of them. My family was so annoyed about the callers I had to put my phone on mute for a very long time. I couldn’t even play on my phone because they were calling me too much. I didn’t think anything could get worse, I was wrong. My photos were deleted and I had memories of family members in their. So I had enough of this app and I had to delete it. When I deleted the APP my phone went back to normal. No viruses, or no callers, and my photos were back.  I would not download this app ever again!
attributes.title: Don’t download, Please!
